<p>Men. We can be confusing and hard to figure out — especially when it comes to gift-giving.</p>



<p>So The Post decided we shouldn’t hold back. Shoot for the moon and land among the stars, right? If you’re shopping for gifts for men who have everything, you’re in luck. We&#8217;ve found the best gifts ideas for men from <a href="https://www.awin1.com/cread.php?awinmid=30347&amp;awinaffid=796935&amp;campaign=&amp;clickref=nyp-GG---bestgiftideasformen&amp;ued=https%3A%2F%2Fshop.lululemon.com%2Fstory%2Fmen&amp;platform=pl" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noreferrer noopener" data-nyp-affiliate="true">lululemon</a>, <a href="https://go.skimresources.com?id=93051X1547088&amp;xs=1&amp;xcust=nyp-GG---bestgiftideasformen&amp;url=https%3A%2F%2Fshop.bombas.com%2F" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noreferrer noopener" data-nyp-affiliate="true">Bombas</a>, <a href="https://go.skimresources.com?id=93051X1547088&amp;xs=1&amp;xcust=nyp-GG---bestgiftideasformen&amp;url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.therabody.com%2Fus%2Fen-us%2Fhome" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noreferrer noopener" data-nyp-affiliate="true">Therabody</a> and more!</p>



<p>We picked great gifts for the picky <a href="https://nypost.com/article/best-christmas-holiday-gifts-ideas-for-husband/" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener">husbands</a> and tricky<a href="https://nypost.com/article/best-christmas-holiday-gifts-ideas-for-boyfriend/" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener"> boyfriends</a>, and maybe even a little something to treat the fella you&#8217;re in a &#8220;situationship&#8221; with. Might as well, right?</p>



<p>Don&#8217;t get the man in your life another mug (unless it’s the <a href="https://shop.nypost.com/collections/gifts-accessories" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noreferrer noopener" data-nyp-affiliate="true">best mug in the world</a>), and don&#8217;t just grab another <a href="https://nypost.com/article/best-e-gift-cards-online/" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener">gift card</a> (unless, of course, that&#8217;s what he wants).&nbsp;</p>


<div id="connatix-outstream-video"></div>
<p>Instead, opt for something from his favorite book or movie, his go-to style shop, or to help fulfill his favorite hobby. You can find these and more just by looking through our well-curated shopping list of gift ideas for men below.&nbsp;</p>

<p>For the guy who struggles to find the &#8220;perfect fit,&#8221; we have a solution: the denim from The Perfect Jean. Trust us when we say that they have more than a few pairs worth slipping into. Take the Slim Thick Fit, for example. They&#8217;re not too tight or baggy, making them a great option for men who don&#8217;t like squeezing into <em>anything</em> but want to avoid looking sloppy. Gift them to someone working on their quads (we see those gains, bruh!) or who simply prefers their jeans with more flexibility. They come in 13 different washes, are available in 99% cotton or OG Stretch, and are sure to become a favorite in his closet.</p>

<p>Every guy needs help keeping watch over his dominion, and this compact camera is one of the best and most affordable tools for improving home security. It works as an indoor or outdoor camera and wirelessly transmits live HD video footage that can be reviewed via the Wyze app from a smartphone.</p>



<p>The <a href="https://go.skimresources.com?id=93051X1547088&amp;xs=1&amp;xcust=nyp-FF---&amp;url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.wyze.com%2Fproducts%2Fwyze-cam-og" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noreferrer noopener" data-nyp-affiliate="true">Wyze Cam</a> has motion sensors and sends notifications of activity in and around the house, and with its two-way audio function, users can hear and talk back to anyone on their property. The color night vision also provides greater visibility in the dark, when you want to be most on guard.</p>

The tailored fit ensures a flattering look, while the machine-washable fabric makes it easy to care for.</p>

If he is a fan of hot coffee, he&#8217;ll be a fan of this cool mug.</p>

<p>It&#8217;s hard to think of a better gift for a whiskey enthusiast than a man-sized crate dedicated to the stuff. That&#8217;s what you get when you gift Man Crate’s Whiskey Appreciation Crate. Customize a decanter and two rocks glasses to accompany perfectly paired snacks and coasters, and top it off with a whiskey-drinking journal.</p>

				<script type="text/javascript">
			// Send an event on clicks for link elements with data-nyp-affiliate="true", wait until the document has loaded.
			document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
				const affiliateLinks = document.querySelectorAll('a[data-nyp-affiliate="true"]');
				// Return early if we don't have any links.
				if ( ! affiliateLinks ) {
					return;
				}
				// Loop through the links and add the event listener.
				affiliateLinks.forEach(function(link) {
					link.addEventListener('click', function(event) {

						const {
							nypScripts: {
								nypost_wp_vars: {
									nypostSite: siteId = '',
								} = {},
							} = {},
						} = window;

						// Check if we are on the element with the a[data-nyp-affiliate="true"].
						let link = event.target;
						if ( 'true' !== link.dataset.nypAffiliate ) {
							// If not, get the closest one then get the href from that.
							link = event.target.closest('a[data-nyp-affiliate="true"]');
						}

						// Get the URL from the link.
						let href = link.href || '';

						// Bail if we don't have a href.
						if ( ! href ) {
							return;
						}

						// If the URL does not have the protocol we need to add it or URL() will throw an error.
						if (!href.startsWith('http://') && !href.startsWith('https://')) {
							href = 'https://' + href;
						}

						// Get the URL from the link.
						if (href.match(new RegExp(`https?://go.${siteId}.com/`))) {
							// Extract the URL from the skimlinks href.
							href = new URL(href).searchParams.get('url') || href;
						}

						// Get the URL hostname, for example: www.amazon.com.
						const retailer = new URL(href).hostname;

						gtag('event', 'outbound', {
							'internal_source': window.location.href,
							'external_destination': href,
							'retailer': retailer,
							'post_id': "24022684",
						});
					});
				});
			});
		</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
	var windowOpen;
	document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function() {
		const shareLinks = document.querySelectorAll('li.share-facebook a');
		shareLinks.forEach(function(shareLink) {
			// Exclude email from opening in modal window.
			if ( shareLink.href.indexOf('mailto') !== -1 ) {
				return;
			}

			shareLink.addEventListener('click', function(event) {
				event.preventDefault();
				if ( 'undefined' !== typeof windowOpen ){ // If there's another sharing window open, close it.
					windowOpen.close();
				}
				windowOpen = window.open( shareLink.href, 'wpcomfacebook', 'menubar=1,resizable=1,width=600,height=400' );
			});
		});
	});
</script>
